issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: In Hive, "insert overwrite local directory" first deletes the overwritten directory if exists, recreate a new one, then copy the files from src directory to the new local directory. This process sometimes changes the permissions of the to-be-overwritten local directory, therefore causing some applications no more to be able to access its content.
fields.summary: Insert overwrite local directory should perserve the overwritten directory permission

comments.body: Patch from HIVE-12908 may have fixed this. You may try with that one.
